snippet: The American Association of Orthodontists has been running ads aimed at the rising number of adults seeking braces or teeth-straightening services.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column highlights campaign from the American Association of Orthodontists aimed at adults seeking braces or teeth-straightening services.
lead_paragraph: The American Association of Orthodontists has been running ads aimed at the rising number of adults seeking braces or teeth-straightening services.

headline.seo: Orthodontists Market to Adults Seeking Prettier Smiles
